<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"firstName":{"type":"string","example":"Jane","description":"Prénom"},"birthDate":{"type":"string","example":"1990-05-15","description":"Date de naissance (format YYYY-MM-DD)"},"profileType":{"type":"string","example":"FEMALE","description":"Type de profil (FEMALE, MALE, NON_BINARY, OTHER)","enum":["FEMALE","MALE","NON_BINARY","OTHER"]},"contextType":{"type":"string","example":"CYCLE","description":"Type de contexte (CYCLE, GENERAL, MENOPAUSE, NONE)","enum":["CYCLE","GENERAL","MENOPAUSE","NONE"]},"objective":{"type":"string","example":"WEIGHT_LOSS","description":"Objectif principal"},"sportFrequency":{"type":"string","example":"3_TIMES_WEEK","description":"Fréquence de sport"},"isMenopausal":{"type":"boolean","example":false,"description":"Statut ménopause"}},"title":"UpdateProfileDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Profil mis à jour avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"user":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"cuid_example"},"email":{"type":"string","example":"user@example.com"},"firstName":{"type":"string","example":"Jane"},"birthDate":{"type":"string","example":"1990-05-15"},"profileType":{"type":"string","example":"FEMALE"},"contextType":{"type":"string","example":"CYCLE"},"objective":{"type":"string","example":"WEIGHT_LOSS"},"sportFrequency":{"type":"string","example":"3_TIMES_WEEK"},"isMenopausal":{"type":"boolean","example":false}}}},"required":["user"],"title":"ProfileResponseDto"}}}},"400":{"description":"Données invalides ou erreur de validation"}}}
